title: Relates to insurance coverage for certain prostheses
summary: Relates to insurance coverage for prostheses which are necessary to compensate for the loss of a limb due to accident, injury or disease or the treatment of such conditions provided a treating physician issues a written order for such purchase stating that such purchase is medically necessary to promote the patient's well-being or to promote the healing process.
